name: mediabunny-umd
description: UMD bundle wrapper for mediabunny with a no-bundler browser demo

scripts.prepare:public: rm -rf public && mkdir -p public/services && sed 's#../dist/mediabunny.umd.js#./mediabunny.umd.js#' demo/index.html > public/index.html && sed 's#../dist/mediabunny.umd.js#./mediabunny.umd.js#' demo/alt.html > public/alt.html && sed 's#../dist/mediabunny.umd.js#./mediabunny.umd.js#' demo/sessions.html > public/sessions.html && cp dist/mediabunny.umd.js public/mediabunny.umd.js && cp demo/remux.worker.js public/remux.worker.js && cp demo/idb-recorder.js public/idb-recorder.js && cp demo/services/remuxService.js public/services/remuxService.js
